body:
# Version 1.2.0
## [Changelog](https://github.com/helly25/proto/blob/1.2.0/CHANGELOG.md)

* Added std::optional variants for file reading.
* Added `HasBinaryProtoExtension` and `HasTextProtoExtension`.

## For Bazel MODULES.bazel

```
bazel_dep(name = "helly25_proto", version = "1.2.0")
```

### Using the provided LLVM

Copy [llvm.MODULE.bazel](https://github.com/helly25/proto/blob/main/bazelmod/llvm.MODULE.bazel) to your repository's root directory and add the following line to your MODULES.bazel file or paste the whole contents into it.

```
include("//:llvm.MODULE.bazel")
```

## For Bazel WORKSPACE

```
load("@bazel_tools//tools/build_defs/repo:http.bzl", "http_archive")

http_archive(
  name = "com_helly25_proto",
  url = "https://github.com/helly25/proto/releases/download/1.2.0/proto-1.2.0.tar.gz",
  sha256 = "18a7fbc722be19135f6c08396f1f20a64c159088384b16a8a6bb390aa86ceea7",
  strip_prefix = "proto-1.2.0",

)
```


## What's Changed
* Bump version to 1.1.1 by @helly25 in https://github.com/helly25/proto/pull/45
* Improve/add file functions by @helly25 in https://github.com/helly25/proto/pull/46


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/helly25/proto/compare/1.1.0...1.2.0

# Version 1.1.0
## [Changelog](https://github.com/helly25/proto/blob/1.1.0/CHANGELOG.md)

* Added `ReadBinaryProtoFile`, `ReadTextProtoFile`, `WriteBinaryProtoFile`, `WriteTextProtoFile`.

## For Bazel MODULES.bazel

```
bazel_dep(name = "helly25_proto", version = "1.1.0")
```

### Using the provided LLVM

Copy [llvm.MODULE.bazel](https://github.com/helly25/proto/blob/main/bazelmod/llvm.MODULE.bazel) to your repository's root directory and add the following line to your MODULES.bazel file or paste the whole contents into it.

```
include("//:llvm.MODULE.bazel")
```

## For Bazel WORKSPACE

```
load("@bazel_tools//tools/build_defs/repo:http.bzl", "http_archive")

http_archive(
  name = "com_helly25_proto",
  url = "https://github.com/helly25/proto/releases/download/1.1.0/proto-1.1.0.tar.gz",
  sha256 = "3f3c286770976f11bbfa503af1b01d68fdc4ecb9ac9e00be805b6bf59fab0c82",
)
```


## What's Changed
* Improve release handling by @helly25 in https://github.com/helly25/proto/pull/40
* Added file ops by @helly25 in https://github.com/helly25/proto/pull/41
* Fix tags for code snippets. by @helly25 in https://github.com/helly25/proto/pull/43
* Switch to explicit static reading. by @helly25 in https://github.com/helly25/proto/pull/42
* Make proto file functions public. by @helly25 in https://github.com/helly25/proto/pull/44


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/helly25/proto/compare/1.0.2...1.1.0

# Version 1.0.2
## [Changelog](https://github.com/helly25/proto/blob/1.0.2/CHANGELOG.md)

## For Bazel WORKSPACE

```
load("@bazel_tools//tools/build_defs/repo:http.bzl", "http_archive")
```

## For Bazel MODULES.bazel

### Using the provided LLVM

Copy [llvm.MODULE.bazel](https://github.com/helly25/proto/blob/main/bazelmod/llvm.MODULE.bazel) to your repository's root directory and add the following line to your MODULES.bazel file or paste the whole contents into it.

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/helly25/proto/compare/1.0.1...1.0.2

# Version 1.0.1
## [Changelog](https://github.com/helly25/proto/blob/1.0.1/CHANGELOG.md)

* Repackage 1.0.0.

## For Bazel WORKSPACE

```
load("@bazel_tools//tools/build_defs/repo:http.bzl", "http_archive")

http_archive(
  name = "com_helly25_proto",
  url = "https://github.com/helly25/proto/releases/download/1.0.1/proto-1.0.1.tar.gz",
  sha256 = "f5e08009ca056e2a960001dcd97699c88b82c0b8fbd75ad6b85774938e0be7df",
)
```

## For Bazel MODULES.bazel

```
bazel_dep(name = "helly25_proto", version = "1.0.1")
```

### Using the provided LLVM

Copy [llvm.MODULE.bazel](https://github.com/helly25/proto/blob/main/bazelmod/llvm.MODULE.bazel) to your repository's root directory and add the following line to your MODULES.bazel file or paste the whole contents into it.

```
include("//:llvm.MODULE.bazel")
```


## What's Changed
* Do not save caches for tags by @helly25 in https://github.com/helly25/proto/pull/27
* Improve LLVM-20.1.0 config by @helly25 in https://github.com/helly25/proto/pull/28
* Update readme by @helly25 in https://github.com/helly25/proto/pull/29
* Support /.bazelrc.user iff present. by @helly25 in https://github.com/helly25/proto/pull/30
* Root BUILD.bazel file must be empty by @helly25 in https://github.com/helly25/proto/pull/31
* Prepared version 1.0.0 by @helly25 in https://github.com/helly25/proto/pull/32
* Release pre script update. by @helly25 in https://github.com/helly25/proto/pull/34
* Fix release prep by @helly25 in https://github.com/helly25/proto/pull/35
* Virtual file must reside in prefix dir by @helly25 in https://github.com/helly25/proto/pull/37
* Version 1.0.0+bcr1 by @helly25 in https://github.com/helly25/proto/pull/38
* Version 1.0.1 by @helly25 in https://github.com/helly25/proto/pull/39


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/helly25/proto/compare/0.6.3...1.0.1

# Version 1.0.0
## [Changelog](https://github.com/helly25/proto/blob/1.0.0/CHANGELOG.md)

* Changed to empty root BUILD file for release packages.
* Cut and packaged version 1.0.0 (no functionality changes compared to 0.6.4).

## For Bazel WORKSPACE

```
load("@bazel_tools//tools/build_defs/repo:http.bzl", "http_archive")

http_archive(
  name = "com_helly25_proto",
  url = "https://github.com/helly25/proto/releases/download/1.0.0/proto-1.0.0.tar.gz",
  sha256 = "15e06fd497546af4413260cc0f28ef605a66c14b99afad1f06259257c704076e",
)
```

## For Bazel MODULES.bazel

```
bazel_dep(name = "helly25_proto", version = "1.0.1")  # Version 1.0.0 was repackaged!
```

### Using the provided LLVM

Copy [llvm.MODULE.bazel](https://github.com/helly25/proto/blob/main/bazelmod/llvm.MODULE.bazel) to your repository's root directory and add the following line to your MODULES.bazel file or paste the whole contents into it.

```
include("//:llvm.MODULE.bazel")
```


## What's Changed
* Do not save caches for tags by @helly25 in https://github.com/helly25/proto/pull/27
* Improve LLVM-20.1.0 config by @helly25 in https://github.com/helly25/proto/pull/28
* Update readme by @helly25 in https://github.com/helly25/proto/pull/29
* Support /.bazelrc.user iff present. by @helly25 in https://github.com/helly25/proto/pull/30
* Root BUILD.bazel file must be empty by @helly25 in https://github.com/helly25/proto/pull/31
* Prepared version 1.0.0 by @helly25 in https://github.com/helly25/proto/pull/32
* Release pre script update. by @helly25 in https://github.com/helly25/proto/pull/34
* Fix release prep by @helly25 in https://github.com/helly25/proto/pull/35


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/helly25/proto/compare/0.6.3...1.0.0

# Version 0.6.3
## [Changelog](https://github.com/helly25/proto/blob/0.6.3/CHANGELOG.md)

* Made macro `PARSE_TEXT_PROTO` issue a deprecation warning.
* Raised minimum zlib version when built with proto version 27.0 for MacOS.
* Enabled bazel layering_check.

## For Bazel WORKSPACE

```
load("@bazel_tools//tools/build_defs/repo:http.bzl", "http_archive")

http_archive(
  name = "com_helly25_proto",
  url = "https://github.com/helly25/proto/releases/download/0.6.3/proto-0.6.3.tar.gz",
  sha256 = "8c2666752a5d0b5bfa6db05efb4863eb36178d07e5dbc8e3964b086a436ec514",
)
```

## For Bazel MODULES.bazel

```
bazel_dep(name = "helly25_proto", version = "0.6.3")
```

### Using the provided LLVM

Copy [llvm.MODULE.bazel](https://github.com/helly25/proto/blob/main/bazelmod/llvm.MODULE.bazel) to your repository's root directory and add the following line to your MODULES.bazel file or paste the whole contents into it.

```
include("//:llvm.MODULE.bazel")
```


## What's Changed
* Deprecate macro PARSE_TEXT_PROTO by @helly25 in https://github.com/helly25/proto/pull/13
* Speed up CI by @helly25 in https://github.com/helly25/proto/pull/14
* Cache deletion. by @helly25 in https://github.com/helly25/proto/pull/15
* Minor fix fr cache deletion by @helly25 in https://github.com/helly25/proto/pull/16
* Delete caches on PR merge by head/ref by @helly25 in https://github.com/helly25/proto/pull/17
* Fix bad substitution by @helly25 in https://github.com/helly25/proto/pull/18
* Additional automatic cache cleanup. by @helly25 in https://github.com/helly25/proto/pull/19
* Correct cache iteration for cache cleanup. by @helly25 in https://github.com/helly25/proto/pull/20
* Drop a sneaky quote... by @helly25 in https://github.com/helly25/proto/pull/21
* Add dummy 'done' job. by @helly25 in https://github.com/helly25/proto/pull/22
* Fix ref names (must be 'refs/heads/') as in both plural. by @helly25 in https://github.com/helly25/proto/pull/23
* Layering_check by @helly25 in https://github.com/helly25/proto/pull/24
* Update/simplify deps management by @helly25 in https://github.com/helly25/proto/pull/25
* More cache cleanup work. by @helly25 in https://github.com/helly25/proto/pull/26


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/helly25/proto/compare/0.6.2...0.6.3

# Version 0.6.2
## [Changelog](https://github.com/helly25/proto/blob/0.6.2/CHANGELOG.md)

* Updated protobuf dev dependency to v30.0 to ensure compatibility.
* Updated CI matrix to cover more combinations.
* Implemented (again) the elusive `PARSE_TEXT_PROTO` from 2010 as referenced by clang-tidy's documentation.

## For Bazel WORKSPACE

```
load("@bazel_tools//tools/build_defs/repo:http.bzl", "http_archive")

http_archive(
  name = "com_helly25_proto",
  url = "https://github.com/helly25/proto/releases/download/0.6.2/proto-0.6.2.tar.gz",
  sha256 = "f34e02d1b5b17076df1cb26b36aab3c7b35ad48e3f117210c45dac8a2b245284",
)
```

## For Bazel MODULES.bazel

```
bazel_dep(name = "helly25_proto", version = "0.6.2")
```

### Using the provided LLVM

Copy [llvm.MODULE.bazel](https://github.com/helly25/proto/blob/main/bazelmod/llvm.MODULE.bazel) to your repository's root directory and add the following line to your MODULES.bazel file or paste the whole contents into it.

```
include("//:llvm.MODULE.bazel")
```


## What's Changed
* Updated protobuf v30.0 by @helly25 in https://github.com/helly25/proto/pull/11
* Added PARSE_TEXT_PROTO by @helly25 in https://github.com/helly25/proto/pull/12


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/helly25/proto/compare/0.6.1...0.6.2

# Version 0.6.1
## [Changelog](https://github.com/helly25/proto/blob/0.6.1/CHANGELOG.md)

* Updated license/copyright to add SPDX headers.
* Updated internal tooling.

## For Bazel WORKSPACE

```
load("@bazel_tools//tools/build_defs/repo:http.bzl", "http_archive")

http_archive(
  name = "com_helly25_proto",
  url = "https://github.com/helly25/proto/releases/download/0.6.1/proto-0.6.1.tar.gz",
  sha256 = "055c7345ec1dc9bed9ffe8b3e781143ad25245e69b0580a103e4c92d44d217cd",
)
```

## For Bazel MODULES.bazel

```
bazel_dep(name = "helly25_proto", version = "0.6.1")
```

### Using the provided LLVM

Copy [llvm.MODULE.bazel](https://github.com/helly25/proto/blob/main/bazelmod/llvm.MODULE.bazel) to your repository's root directory and add the following line to your MODULES.bazel file or paste the whole contents into it.

```
include("//:llvm.MODULE.bazel")
```


## What's Changed
* Update tooling and licenses. by @helly25 in https://github.com/helly25/proto/pull/10


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/helly25/proto/compare/0.6.0...0.6.1

Version 0.6.0, see [changelog](https://github.com/helly25/proto/blob/0.6.0/CHANGELOG.md)

* Added Bazel module support.
* Added new modern `SilentErrorCollector`.
* Updated Clang to 19.1.6.
* Verified and updated protobuf to v30-rc.2. Note that at least v28.3 ... v29.3 are affected by https://github.com/protocolbuffers/protobuf/issues/19364 which is fixed in v30-rc.2 Note that the affected versions work fine with Clang 19.1.6.
* Added a patch for MODULE.bazel to be set to protobuf version 28, in order to reduce requirements on complex projects.
* Added a build matrix merge check to guarantee various combinations work.
* Pinned bazel version to 7.2.1.
* Updated other dependencies to latest.

```
load("@bazel_tools//tools/build_defs/repo:http.bzl", "http_archive")

http_archive(
  name = "com_helly25_proto",
  url = "https://github.com/helly25/proto/archive/refs/tags/0.6.0.tar.gz",
  sha256 = "84847051a51a238ea3ed9c395878c4651210c326990a4aa36ebd9a641702c344",
)
```

Version 0.5, see [changelog](https://github.com/helly25/proto/blob/0.5/CHANGELOG.md)

* Added support for com_google_protobuf >= Protocol Buffers v26.
* Moved `ParseTextProtoHelper` into namespace `mbo::proto::proto_internal`.
* Changed `ParseTextProtoHelper` to only accept derived proto messages on operator access.
* Changed `ParseTextProtoHelper` to die on parsing failure.
* Added `ParseText<T>() -> absl::StatusOr<T>`.
* Improved error message detail for all parsing functions.
* Updated all dependencies.
* Verified protobuf versions 25.2, 26.0, 26.1, 27.0, 27.1, 27.2, 28.0-rc1.
* Added Clang support.
* Updated GH actions.

```
load("@bazel_tools//tools/build_defs/repo:http.bzl", "http_archive")

http_archive(
  name = "com_helly25_proto",
  url = "https://github.com/helly25/proto/archive/refs/tags/0.5.tar.gz",
  sha256 = "36f553f6dafd3dc5d00c10471628eebbf7bfa2311d28e17dbb2ae0e37adba4da",
)
```

Version 0.4, see [changelog](https://github.com/helly25/proto/blob/0.4/CHANGELOG.md)

* Changed `ParseTextProto`, `ParseTextProtoOrDie` to only work for actual derived proto types.
* Added `ParseProto` which returns `absl::StatusOr<MessageType>`.
* Updated external dependencies.

```
load("@bazel_tools//tools/build_defs/repo:http.bzl", "http_archive")

http_archive(
  name = "com_helly25_proto",
  url = "https://github.com/helly25/proto/archive/refs/tags/0.4.tar.gz",
  sha256 = "4b35b6d02cfe812cf09a54b92c86f77a7828578f6eaa3917b376c68b3f636cd6",
)
```

* Added missing dependency.

```
load("@bazel_tools//tools/build_defs/repo:http.bzl", "http_archive")

http_archive(
  name = "com_helly25_proto",
  url = "https://github.com/helly25/proto/archive/refs/tags/0.3.tar.gz",
  sha256 = "1d1bea546e88c92fabaa92f99490bd0e1cb2df78db3155daec4515c7f74cb35d",
)
```

Small fixes, mostly to support a few older abseil/re2 versions.

```
load("@bazel_tools//tools/build_defs/repo:http.bzl", "http_archive")

http_archive(
  name = "com_helly25_proto",
  url = "https://github.com/helly25/proto/archive/refs/tags/0.2.tar.gz",
  sha256 = "1ce4019404f463d88964f654c32d06db57fc6b50b3e6befb833751cb49890238",
)
```

Initial release.

```
load("@bazel_tools//tools/build_defs/repo:http.bzl", "http_archive")

http_archive(
  name = "com_helly25_proto",
  url = "https://github.com/helly25/proto/archive/refs/tags/0.1.tar.gz",
  sha256 = "9047ced517c47ca57b67ac5a2f219ea31158be972193b5f76b10a1d3ec8eb4a8",
)
```
